abilities.name: Stages of Evolution
abilities.text: As long as Magmar is an Evolved Pokémon, all Energy attached to Magmar are Fire Energy instead of their usual types.

attacks.name: Linear Attack
attacks.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 10 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Burning Sensation
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon already has any damage counters on it, the Defending Pokémon is now Burned.
